import React from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../components/NavBar'; const TournamentManagement = ({ tournaments, userRole: propUserRole, message, errorMessage }) => { const location = useLocation(); // passed via redirect const { userRole: stateUserRole } = location.state || {}; // Default to undefined if state is not passed // if called as function >> passed as redirect const userRole = propUserRole || stateUserRole; return ( <>
{message &&

{message}

} {errorMessage &&

{errorMessage}

}

Tournament Management

{userRole === 'ROLE_USER' && (

Available Tournaments. Registration Period: Until Date of Tournament

{tournaments.map((tournament) => ( ))}
Tournament Min Elo Max Elo Date Vacancies Actions
{tournament.title} {tournament.minElo} {tournament.maxElo} {new Date(tournament.date).toLocaleDateString()} {tournament.size - tournament.participants.length}
)} {userRole === 'ROLE_ADMIN' && (

Manage Tournament Here.

{tournaments.map((tournament) => ( ))}
Tournament Min Elo Max Elo Date Vacancies Actions
{tournament.title} {tournament.minElo} {tournament.maxElo} {new Date(tournament.date).toLocaleDateString()} {tournament.size - tournament.participants.length}
)}
); }; export default TournamentManagement;
